title: What is a used drawing pencil? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I understand the question correctly, it could refer to a pencil, which has been “used” and is therefore no longer pristine and new. Even if it were used only once, it would still be a “used” pencil. We could also define a pencil, which has been “used up”. This means it has been used so many times, it is too short to use easily any longer.
